original_title: CIC Trump puts TEETH into the law >>>  Trump Administration REVOKES Business License of Employer Who Hired Illegal Alien Responsible for Killing 3 in Florida Truck Crash  — The Donald
article_summary: Trump Administration Revokes Business License of Employer Who Hired Illegal Alien Responsible for Deadly Florida Crash. Online discussions suggest a call for stricter enforcement against businesses hiring illegals, with some advocating for fines, arrests, and shunning.</s>
